feed_items.title: Docker 0.9:  introducing execution drivers and libcontainer
feed_items.summary: Today we are happy to introduce Docker 0.9. With this release we are continuing our focus on quality over features, shrinking and stabilizing the core, and providing first-class support for all major operating systems.

feed_items.title: How Thieves Steal Your Bitcoins
feed_items.summary: Even though Bitcoin exchange Mt. Gox and Canadian bank Flexcoin had to shut down after recent cyber-attacks, crypto-currencies continue to grow in popularity. The soaring value of virtual crypto-currencies such as Bitcoin makes them attractive to thieves, however, and users need to take steps to secure their wallets.

feed_items.title: The Youngest Technorati
feed_items.summary: Ryan Orbuch, 16 years old, rolled a suitcase to the front door of his familyâ€™s house in Boulder, Colo., on a Friday morning a year ago. He was headed for the bus stop, then the airport, then Texas.

feed_items.title: iOS 7.1
feed_items.summary: iOS 7.1 is packed with interface refinements, bug fixes, improvements, and new features. Apple CarPlay introduces a better way to use iPhone while driving. And you can now control exactly how long Siri listens and more. Getting the update is easy. Go to Settings. Select General. And tap Software Update.

feed_items.title: The Wolfram Technology Conference Egg-Bot Challenge Winners
feed_items.summary: We have a programming competition every year at the Wolfram Technology Conference, which in past years was the Mathematica One-Liner Competition. This year we held the Egg-Bot Challenge, a change of pace to give attendees a chance to exercise their graphics skills.

feed_items.title: How An Arcane Coding Method From 1970s Banking Software Could Save The Sanity Of Web Developers Everywhere
feed_items.summary: Forty years ago, a Canadian bank pioneered a brand new computer system that allowed non-programmers to help write code. The paradigm was so disruptive that it was ignored by computer scientists for decades. But as web apps get increasingly complex, and web devs become increasingly stressed out, â€œflow-based programmingâ€ may be raging back to life.

feed_items.title: DoSomething.org Is Upping the Snapchat Game
feed_items.summary:
DoSomething.org is all about empowering young people. 

 The organization, one of the largest non-profits for teens and young adults in the United States, connects 13-to-25 year olds through a wide variety of social causes. It didnâ€™t take long for DoSomething.org strategy leaders to realize that Snapchat users fall within that exact age demographic.

feed_items.title: 1 Billion
feed_items.summary: Kickstarter just had the billionth dollar pledged on the platform. The company published a fun infographic of some of their data to celebrate. They included a map of how much each country had pledged total, but they didnâ€™t show where all the money had gone to.

It looks like the work of David Copperfield, but itâ€™s real, and itâ€™s set to start a revolution in the sailing world.
